Knowing the ecosystem's status of High Availability/Disaster Recovery is essential. Having a single point of failure - like the SQL or the WordPress servers - and not recognizing it can lead to disastrous consequences. Just imagine if one of them goes out, the system goes down, and the client comes back to you with some angry words. By adequately describing the HA/DR to them, you leave space to mend the problem or leave it as they see fit.
